page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: The modern estates built in the last 20 years are mainly four bedroomed houses. They are detached and classed as executive housing. House prices in this area are high. Some of the older houses have sold off a part of their garden for building. Each village has some Local Authority housing but the area is predominantly privately owned houses. In some of the lanes connecting the villages are some very large houses. One resident remarked that when her parents built their house 30 years ago it was the largest in the road. Now many of the old cottages have been demolished and their home appears very modest in comparison to the new dwellings. Much of the farmland has disappeared for housing.
